msg: execute from the source tree root (e.g. httpd-2.0 or apr itself) with
the syntax perl cvsdsp5 -[5|6] to convert to devstudio 5 or 6 dsp format

msg: Detect mach-o/dyld.h, which we'll need for DSO support on Darwin.

author: wsanchez
msg: If we don't have sigwait(), but we have sigsuspend(), use the latter.

author: rbb
msg: Make libtool a configure-time option.  This is done with --without-libtool.
The default is to use libtool
